data.decision: Created design_to_code_verifier skill to close the design-to-code feedback loop
data.rationale: This skill complements dual_direction_design by verifying implementations match approved designs. It extracts tokens from .pen files, scans code for matching values, and reports drift with severity levels. Key feature: maps CSS variables to hex colors so var(--color-primary) matches #8B5CF6. This enables taste compounding - design decisions can now be validated against code automatically.
data.context: Building the design-code feedback loop for MSJ and future projects
